pages.text: You've found a rare $(bold)Bell of Secrets!$() This bell will play a 2 note chime when rung. However, it will play an extended 8 note chime if there is a treasure chest or barrel nearby! Try ringing it in every room of a dungeon.

Due to the magical nature of the bell it only works in the dungeon dimension. The Bell of Secrets is strangely silent in all other dimensions.$(br2)For the technically inclined the blocks which will trigger the secret chime are determined by the block tag 'dimdungeons:dimdungeons_secret_chime_blocks'.
